title: Open-source web developer
intro1: My name is Guillaume Migeon, I'm
intro2: years old and I'm a new technologies adept web developer.
story_text:
I'm currently working fulltime as a consultant for Versusmind, in France. On my free time I work on personal projects to learn new tools and improve myself. I'm currently working on a VR game for my HTC Vive.

Among all the tools I use, I really enjoy git, my bash terminal, npm (that I now use instead of Grunt/Gulp), bower, jquery, mustachejs and composer.
projects_description: Below is a non-exhaustive list of some projects I made and that I consider developped enough to be released. For a complete list you can browse my Github page.
footer: Made with PhpStorm, Vue.js, Materialize and Git

project.title: QuizzBot
project.description: An IRC bot which asks question in a channel!

project.title: Liliusm
project.description: A desktop app which allows you to make a Linux live USB. This is a work in progress !

project.title: CanvasKeyboard
project.description: A JS library which allows you to add a virtual keyboard on a web site or app.

project.title: Yopmail Helper
project.description: An extension which helps you use several Yopmail email adresses. Work in progress.

project.title: TFS Helper
project.description: Open the description content of a TFS task in a popup for easier reading.

project.title: ChronoStan
project.description: Determine the closest tram station in Nancy, France and gives you the incoming timetables.

project.title: CS:GO Binds Generator
project.description: Open-source tool which helps you create binds in the game Counter-Strike:GO.

project.title: CS:GO Binds Generator Beta
project.description: Complete rework of the app with AngularJS.

project.title: C4FE
project.description: Helps you organize whose turn it is to pay the coffee

project.title: Remind me later
project.description: Google Chrome extension which goal is to remind you tabs in a given time.

project.title: Portfolio
project.description: This portfolio which let me display my released projects.

project.title: Calendar application
project.description: Calendar application made during my internship in 2014 for the CC Magnetisme laboratory.
